basics.name: Patompong Manprasatkul
basics.label: Senior iOS Engineer
basics.summary: An iOS engineer who interested in self driving electric vehicle

work.name: Careem
work.summary: Careem is the internet platform for the greater Middle East region. A pioneer of the region's ride-hailing economy, Careem is expanding services across its platform to include mass transportation, delivery and payments to become the region's everyday SuperApp. Careem's mission is to simplify and improve the lives of people and build a lasting organisation that inspires. Careem was established in July 2012, and was acquired by Uber in 2020. Careem operates in over 100 cities across 14 countries and has created more than one million employment opportunities in the region.
highlights: Working iOS food delivery app since the beginning of CareemNOW aka Careem's food delivery service
